page.title: 18Industries - Large
page.content: {KENYONS}is owned by James Kenyon and the company has its headquarters in Pontardawe. It has branches in Bristol, Dewsbury, Glasgow,Newport, Scunthorpe, Milford-Haven,Ebbw-Vale, Port-Talbot and Basingstoke. The group manufactures and sells heating, refrigeration, air-conditioning, ventilation and electrical equipment for the nuclear power industry, oil rigs and petrochemical instillations in Britain and abroad. They also make industrial plant. {Canning Brett}owned by P.S.M. Internationl employs 200 people and manufactures various fasteners for fixing metal to metal. {Economic Drums Ltd. }manufacture and supply polyethylene tubs and buckets, plastic bottles, P.V.C. sacks and steel drums suitable for chemicals, paints and other liquids.
